title: Ibuprofen
subTitle: Ibuprofen sub title
desc: Ibuprofen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used for relieving pain, reducing fever, and decreasing inflammation. It is commonly used to treat headaches, muscle aches, arthritis, and menstrual cramps.

title: Paracetamol
subTitle: Paracetamol sub title
desc: Paracetamol, also known as acetaminophen, is a medication used to treat pain and fever. It is typically used for mild to moderate pain relief and is often found in combination with other medications.

title: Naproxen
subTitle: Naproxen sub title
desc: Naproxen is an NSAID used to relieve pain and inflammation in conditions such as arthritis, muscle aches, and menstrual cramps. It works by reducing hormones that cause inflammation and pain in the body.

title: Diclofenac
subTitle: Diclofenac sub title
desc: Diclofenac is an NSAID used to treat pain and inflammatory disorders such as arthritis. It is available in various forms, including tablets, gels, and injections.

title: Celecoxib
subTitle: Celecoxib sub title
desc: Celecoxib is a COX-2 inhibitor used to treat pain and inflammation associated with arthritis and other conditions. It works by blocking the enzyme that produces prostaglandins, which cause inflammation and pain.

title: Meloxicam
subTitle: Meloxicam sub title
desc: Meloxicam is an NSAID used to treat pain and inflammation in conditions such as arthritis. It works by reducing the production of substances in the body that cause inflammation and pain.

title: Tramadol
subTitle: Tramadol sub title
desc: Tramadol is a pain reliever used to treat moderate to severe pain. It works by changing the way the brain and nervous system respond to pain.

title: Codeine
subTitle: Codeine sub title
desc: Codeine is an opioid pain medication used to treat mild to moderately severe pain. It is often combined with other medications, such as acetaminophen, to enhance pain relief.

title: Hydrocodone
subTitle: Hydrocodone sub title
desc: Hydrocodone is an opioid pain medication used to treat severe pain. It is often combined with acetaminophen or ibuprofen to enhance its pain-relieving effects.

title: Oxycodone
subTitle: Oxycodone sub title
desc: Oxycodone is an opioid pain medication used to treat moderate to severe pain. It works by changing the way the brain and nervous system respond to pain.
